price: 33. Ablekal racmaan kinni Rabbik meesiteeh, Yallal yuduure sorkocô baxa luk yemeete mara kinni. (Qhiyaamah ayró).
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
